cn.title: 关于比特派钱包内兑换 USDT-TRON 的通知及教程

message.data:
怎样兑换USDT-TRON？
在 比特派APP—派银行——USDT理财 初参与。可以将USDT 与 USDT-TRON 进行1：1兑换。

兑换USDT-TRON需要多久？
Tether 官方通常会在两个工作日内完成兑换，具体兑换时长以Tether 官方发布为准。兑换完成后，对应的资产会自动发到您的波场地址中。

持有USDT-TRON 有哪些好处？
波场官方将对TRC20版USDT持币人进行空投奖励。

如何将USDT-TRON兑换回USDT？
目前比特派暂未支持该功能，后续支持将视市场需求而定。

注意事项：
*波场新用户在参与兑换之前需要先切换至波场体系。
*请合理安排兑换时间，兑换期间引发的资产波动，损失由用户自行承担。
*如果您需要帮助，请添加客服微信 dongshaobtc

en.title: How to Swap Your USDT-OMNI for TRC20 Based USDT

message.data:
Dear Bitpiers,You are now able to swap your USDT-OMNI for TRC20 Based USDT. Please follow the steps:
Open Bitpie APP- Pie Bank - USDT Financial Plan.

How long does it take to complete the swapping?
Tether will complete the swapping within two workdays. However, the final duration shall be subject to the official operation by Tether. Upon the ending of the swapping, the corresponding assets will be automatically sent to your TRX address.

What are the benefits of holding USDT-TRON?
The TRON official will give an airdrop reward to the TRC20 based USDT holders.

How to swap USDT-TRON back to USDT-OMNI?
Currently, Bitpie does not support this reverse swapping feature; yet, we will support that as the case may be.

Please be noted:
* New users of TRON need to switch to the TRON system before starting the swap.
* Please arrange your time reasonably. The fluctuation of assets values caused during the swapping period; the losses shall be borne by the users.
*If you need any assistance, feel free to reach out to our customer service team on Telegram: https://t.me/BitpieInternational.
